base_description: White spherical object with a brown base.
part_description: The object has a large white sphere on top and a small brown cylindrical base beneath, centrally aligned.
internal_interaction_description: The white sphere is securely mounted on the brown cylindrical base, allowing the sphere to be elevated and stable. The base provides support, ensuring the sphere remains upright and balanced.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, serving as a decorative item. It may interact with light, casting shadows, and can be moved or repositioned by a person.
